item.title: [BTLO] Malicious PowerShell Analysis Writeup
item.description: Introduction Question 1 Question 2 Question 3 Question 4 Question 5 Question 6 Conclusion Introduction As its name suggests, this challenge will allow us to analyze a malicious powershell file. CyberChef is often a useful tool for this sort of analysis and weâ€™re gonna use it. After downloading the .zip archive, we get a file called "ps_script.txt". Here we get the content with a simple cat command.
